name: {id}
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for updating the specific course

Request payload must contain the following fields:

status: STRING

Request:

PUT - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/mentorCourses/1

raw 
  {
    "status": "COMPLETED"
}

Response:

400 - Bad Request 

  {"status":400,"status_type":"error","message":"Bad Request","count":1,"errors":["Status is invalid, it should be one from ACTIVE, INACTIVE, DELETED, LOCKED."]}
